GeneDef.label: strange appearance
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene possess fairly strange or alien appearance and their own standards reflect this.

A person with this gene will have a two-way relation modifier to others which do not possess this gene. This is based on certain shared genes (romance chance genes such as pig noses).

Unlike the more severe version beauty in this version still apply normally.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Modifier to relations between +10 and -25 depending on similarity

GeneDef.label: alien appearance
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene possess very strange or alien appearance and their own standards reflect this.

A person with this gene will have a two-way relation modifier to others which do not possess this gene. This is based on certain shared genes (romance chance genes such as pig noses).

This gene also negates much of the advantage of beauty in relation those with different standards. (If the penalties are lower than what is stated below that is likely why)

customEffectDescriptions.li: Modifier to relations between +10 and -45 depending on similarity.
Negates some Beauty bonus if they are very dissimilar.
